entry.title: no light, no light
entry.summary:
Author: pigeonegg

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,426Chapters: 3/8Kudos: 98

Summary: Jason falls asleep trying not to desperately inhale the faint scent of Dick’s cologne, trying not to play the words honey and sweetheart over and over in his head, trying not to think of Dick, shirtless in the bathroom, rolling his eyes and walking out without saying a word. He tries an awful lot and fails anyway. This is where it starts: the slamming of a bedroom door. Jason is twelve, and Dick hates him.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 234,617Chapters: 51/54Kudos: 1,814

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham. Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave. The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running. Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human. Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: Tired Stars
entry.summary:
Author: ResidentJazz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,270Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 428

Summary: Dick Grayson has always known how to smile on command, how to play the part people expect — even when it tears him apart. After a public breakdown and a mission that pushes him past his limits, Bruce’s disappointment feels like another verdict he can’t escape. But Jason refuses to let him spiral alone.In the quiet of a safe house, between coffee that tastes like ash, late-night movies, and the weight of a case too close to home, Dick has to confront the question he’s never dared to ask: who is he when he isn’t what Bruce made him?One step at a time, he’ll have to find out.

entry.summary:
Author: Whyyyyyyyyfcky

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,363Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 265

Summary: It was supposed to be a harmless wager. A joke. A moment to tease and move on. But something shifts. The air grows heavier, the silences longer. entry.title: of ice and love
entry.summary:
Author: schicki_micki

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,721Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 27

Summary: Jason Todd. American Ice Hockey Prodigy at only 20 years old, first overall pick, and a man many are scared off. With 6ft and 225lb and a rage nobody can stop, he's earned the name 'Red Hood'. A real nightmare from Gotham, the derby rivals of the Bludhaven Sirens. Richard 'Dick' Grayson, starplayer and captain of the Bludhaven Sirens, famous for his smooth skating and leadership. That's the reason he is tasked to look after their youngest player on the olympic roster. None other than Jason Todd, a type of player he despises and has avoided this far, despite their team's rivalries. Travel overseas, sharing a room, practice and playing on the same line. And they want to win gold.

entry.title: Of All The Gin Joints, Right?
entry.summary:
Author: andthwip

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,175Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 13

Summary: “Rough night?” The voice comes from too close. Dick stiffens. He hadn’t expected to hear that voice tonight, certainly not here. Calm, steady, threaded with something he can’t quite place. Recognition washes over him slowly, like a hand on the back of his neck, grounding. “Yeah," Dick murmurs, lowering his hands from where he had put them over his eyes. The bar swims back into focus; lights blotchy as the last of the phosphines begin to fade. “Something like that.” There’s a pause. The kind that suggests he’s being observed. “You look like you need something stronger than a beer tonight, pretty boy.” The nickname lands softly, a faint edge underneath it. Concern, perhaps. “Want your usual?” Dick swallows, mouth dry. His thoughts slip back to Roman, sharp words, loud words - he doesn’t trust himself to unpack any of it out loud.

entry.title: temporal parts
entry.summary:
Author: escyn

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,390Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 157

Summary: [Jason lets himself drink in the sight of Dick underneath him. He is beautiful like this—flushed, shaking—chest coated in a deep blue kevlar he had never seen before two weeks ago. Jason takes it in now. Reinforced at the shoulders, right where the cowl would connect. Fingerstripes are still there—but the blue bleeds into a bat splashed along his heaving pecs. Undeniably Batman. In blue. Not unlike the red sigil etched into Jason’s own chest. The cruelty inflicted on them was different. Two men grown in different worlds, yet shaped by common griefs—common ghosts—both left hollow. Aching. Needing. By the same title, the same burden—] or, Jason Todd has been Batman for a very long time—has been alone for just as long. Maybe this Dick Grayson can fix that. chapter 2 is just art!
